Summary: The document states that interested applicants can send their CV to Teresa, [REDACTED_EMAIL], for a Data Engineer/ Data Scientist position at DXC Technology. The job involves working on large-scale public-sector projects and requires programming skills in languages like Python, R, SAS, Java, or C++. Knowledge of machine learning methods and data wrangling is also important. Experience with data visualization tools and a strong software engineering background are considered a plus. The ideal candidate should have problem-solving aptitude, analytical skills, business sense, and the ability to work under pressure. A degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field is preferred, and 1-2 years of experience as a Data Analyst or Data Scientist is desired.
